name: Jigsaw Puzzles Ultimate
description:
Jigsaw Puzzle Ultimate brings the jigsaw puzzle experience to your iOS device. Our jigsaw puzzles are suitable for all ages & can be customized to your chosen level of difficulty.

App Features:

• A wide range of puzzle collections available. Each collection is packed full of fun & challenging jigsaw puzzles.
• New free puzzle collections added every week!
• Earn in-game rewards every time you complete a puzzle.
• Get more jigsaw puzzle packs (a wide range available).
• Adjust your game preferences to suit your chosen level of difficulty. Suitable for all ages & abilities.
• Haven't got time to finish your puzzle? No problem as your game progress is automatically saved, allowing you to resume your game where you left off.
